titles.title: For the relief of Mary J. Woodard.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 5/3/1994--Introduced. Deems the service performed by a named individual as an employee of the Central Post fund at Fort Bragg, North Carolina, to be creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement provisions.
